pp1.7:2.2: Sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggova hoti, ummujjitvā nimujjati, ummujjitvā ṭhito hoti, ummujjitvā vipassati viloketi, ummujjitvā patarati, ummujjitvā patigādhappatto hoti, ummujjitvā tiṇṇo hoti pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo. (1)
pp1.7:3.1: Ubhatobhāgavimutto, paññāvimutto, kāyasakkhī, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto, dhammānusārī, saddhānusārī. (2)
